mapper.select: SELECT m.mentorid, m.userid, mr.mtitle as mentoring_mtitle, mr.mentoringimg as mentoring_mentoringimg, mr.mentoringdate as mentoring_mentoringdate FROM mentor m INNER JOIN mentoring mr ON mr.mentorid = m.mentorid WHERE m.userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentor (mentorid, userid, adminid, mentorcom, mentorcon, mentorimg, mcardimg, mentorok, mentorcareer, mentorapply) VALUES (NULL,#{userid},#{adminid},#{mentorcom},#{mentorcon},#{mentorimg},#{mcardimg},#{mentorok},#{mentorcareer},SYSDATE())
